Most Illustrious Sir

In response to the official letter of Your Lordship Abreu, I herewith send the response with which I believe you will be satisfied. I return the letter of the same Abreu.

God keep Your Lordship To the citizen Domingos José de Almeida Secretariat of Finance Antônio Vicente da Fontoura Bagé, February 21, 1842.

Secretariat of the Presidency of the Republic To the citizen Domingos José de Almeida His Residence. From the Minister of Finance.
